meanings.definition: To retract or withdraw a wish.
meanings.sent1: I unwish my wish for a new bike.
meanings.sent2: She decided to unwish her request for a puppy.
meanings.sent3: After seeing the price, he quickly unwished for the expensive car.
meanings.sent4: The magician unwished the rabbit out of the hat.
meanings.sent5: He unwished for rain on his birthday, but the clouds didn't listen.

meanings.definition: A desire that one no longer wants.
meanings.sent1: Her unwish for a vacation surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The unwish for more candy was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: His unwish for a snow day made his classmates laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unwish for fame left her feeling content.
meanings.sent5: The unwish for a time machine lingered in his mind.
